excerpt: Healthy and delicious alternative to regular fried rice made with grated cauliflower

instructions.name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
instructions: Grate the cauliflower and cook it in a large skillet over medium-high heat until tender.
Push the cauliflower to the side of the skillet, add the beaten egg and scramble it until cooked.
Add the chopped carrots, peas, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, minced garlic, minced ginger, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Stir well to combine everything.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes or until vegetables are tender and everything is heated through.
